name: Double Dragon IV
description: The classical side-scroll action game, "Double Dragon" series' newest sequel! A new legend begins!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 support with 512MB Integrated Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
